original_text: And a number of those who had practiced magic arts brought their books together and burned them in the sight of all. And they counted the value of them and found it came to fifty thousand pieces of silver.
korean_text: 또 마술을 행하던 많은 사람이 그 책을 모아 가지고 와서 모든 사람 앞에서 불사르니 그 책 값을 계산한즉 은 오만이나 되더라

sentences.original_text: And a number of those who had practiced magic arts
And they counted the value of them
and found it came to fifty thousand pieces of silver
sentences.korean_translation: 그 가치가 은 오만 드라크마에 달한다는 것을 알았습니다
